GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
usb: dwc3: gadget: Replace list_for_each_entry_safe() if using giveback

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 26a7e6832afe9d9a991cfd9015177f083cf959cc, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit d4f1afe5e896c18ae01099a85dab5e1a198bd2a8. For more details please see the references link.
